experience.title: Specialist Programmer

experience.title: Technology Analyst
highlights: Designed and developed multiple full-fledged web applications from scratch by mentoring a team of four.
Designed and developed a chatbot testing platform using Angular and Spring boot.

Designed and developed a sophisticated video personalization studio. It has options to add annotations on top of a video, rich timeline control options, ability to export entire configuration as JSON file, etc.
Designed and developed a rich video player with personalization options and filed a US patent for the same.
Developed various portals, demo applications for our products with complex layouts.
Interacted directly with clients from US, UK and shared deliverables on time.

experience.title: Web Developer and Designer
highlights: Designed product portals and studio prototypes using Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.
Designed motion graphic videos based on client requirements.
Used Adobe After Effects for designing videos.
Videos have been designed and delivered within timeline with quality.

experience.title: Systems Engineer Trainee

Completed the training with the High Performer badge.
